edu.thu.keg.mdap.datamodel

Interface DataSet

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataSetImpl

    public interface DataSet
    Contains all metadata describing a dataset, stored in a data provider.
    Author:
    Yuanchao Ma

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFeature(DataSetFeature feature)
      Add information about a new feature supported by this dataset
      DataField[] getDataFields()
      Get an array of the fields contained in the dataset
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Get description of this dataset.
      DataSetFeature getFeature(java.lang.Class<? extends DataSetFeature> type)
      Get an instance representing the feature of this dataset supporting the specified feature type
      java.util.Set<DataSetFeature> getFeatures() 
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the name (unique identifier) of the dataset, like a table name in SQL or HIVE.
      DataProvider getProvider()
      Get the provider of this DataSet
      Query getQuery()
      Return a connected ResultSet containing the records of this dataset, if it is loadable.
      boolean isLoadable()
      Whether this dataset is small enough to be loaded into memory
      void writeData(DataContent content)
      Write the actual data of this datset on its provider

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name (unique identifier) of the dataset, like a table name in SQL or HIVE.
        Returns:
        the unique name.

      • getQuery

        Query getQuery()
               throws javax.naming.OperationNotSupportedException,
                      DataProviderException
        Return a connected ResultSet containing the records of this dataset, if it is loadable.
        Returns:
        a JDBC ResultSet. The ResultSet is generated when the method is called for the first time.
        Throws:
        javax.naming.OperationNotSupportedException - when dataset is not loadable
        DataProviderException - when actual data of the DataSet does not exist on the DataProvider

      • getProvider

        DataProvider getProvider()
        Get the provider of this DataSet
        Returns:
        a DataProvider instance

      • isLoadable

        boolean isLoadable()
        Whether this dataset is small enough to be loaded into memory
        Returns:
        a boolean indicates whether this dataset is small enough to be loaded into memory

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Get description of this dataset.
        Returns:
        Human-friendly description.

      • getDataFields

        DataField[] getDataFields()
        Get an array of the fields contained in the dataset
        Returns:
        an array containing all the fields in the schema

      • getFeatures

        java.util.Set<DataSetFeature> getFeatures()
        Returns:
        a map containing all features of this dataset

      • addFeature

        void addFeature(DataSetFeature feature)
        Add information about a new feature supported by this dataset
        Parameters:
        feature - describes the to-be-added feature

      • getFeature

        DataSetFeature getFeature(java.lang.Class<? extends DataSetFeature> type)
        Get an instance representing the feature of this dataset supporting the specified feature type
        Parameters:
        type - The feature type whose instance is expected
        Returns:
        A instance of type or subclass of type

      • writeData

        void writeData(DataContent content)
               throws DataProviderException
        Write the actual data of this datset on its provider
        Parameters:
        content - The DataContent to be written
        Throws:
        DataProviderException - when writing the data provider
